Package com.tokelon.toktales.core.game.state.scene

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IExtendedGameScene  
    IGameScene  
    IGameSceneAssignment
    Used for assigning a scene to a state with custom logic.
    IGameSceneControl<T extends IGameScene>  
    IGameSceneControl.IGameSceneControlFactory  
    IGameSceneControl.IModifiableGameSceneControl<T extends IGameScene>  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseGamescene
    Use as a base for game scenes.
    ExtendedGamescene
    Use as an extended base for game scenes.
    GameSceneControl<T extends IGameScene>  
    GameSceneControl.GameSceneControlFactory  
    GenericGamesceneAssignment<T extends IGameScene>
    Implementation of IGameSceneAssignment using TypeToken.
    Bundles a scene and it's type together in a type safe way that respects generic types.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    InjectGameScene
    When applied to methods, indicates that the method should be invoked and an IGameScene should be injected.
